headline: From Struggling to Thriving: 275% Sales Increase
description: Client's listing was generating minimal sales ($712/month) with poor visibility. We implemented a complete overhaul including SEO and professional A+ content.

details.challenge: Client's listing was generating minimal sales ($712/month) with poor visibility and no clear growth strategy.
details.solution: Complete listing overhaul including SEO optimization, professional A+ content, and strategic PPC campaigns targeting high-intent keywords.
details.results: Revenue jumped from $712 to $2,670 monthly. Units sold increased from 33 to 108. Organic ranking improved significantly.

highlights.title: Listing Overhaul
highlights.description: Complete SEO and Professional A+ Content.
